title: 各位刚接触MC玩的是什么服呢
author: nhqs83
txt_content: RPG 神秘 工业 纯净 拔刀？

replies.author: 16K
replies.txt_content: 创造服  玩的一个小服  公益的

replies.author: MC_tingfeng
replies.txt_content: 除了拔刀，其他都行

replies.author: 无界之空
replies.txt_content: 创造服awa

replies.author: kelord
replies.txt_content: 单机玩了一个月，然后工业服

replies.author: 小栗砸Li_za
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 时间年轮轮
replies.txt_content: 从原版玩起把

replies.author: NoName德里奇
replies.txt_content:
刚接触 MC 的时候玩的是浩方对战平台的一个服务器...
说起来也是历史很久远了

replies.author: SaliCkera
replies.txt_content: 梦世界荒芜空岛3服（突然就停了，伤心）
我似乎遇到过这种贴http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-858413-1-2.html
玩的单人，没玩服务器

replies.author: qq2902812030
replies.txt_content: 纯净，很久才接触mod

replies.author: she_xin
replies.txt_content: 一般都是纯净，之后我就转到了mod

replies.author: Tommer
replies.txt_content: 纯净大服
纯净服吧,纯净玩的最多

replies.author: 坑爹的服
replies.txt_content: 刚开始从生存服开始吧，找个原版纯净的就可以

replies.author: wwooww
replies.txt_content: 手机版     服务器的话是 纯工业

replies.author: MC陈作死
replies.txt_content: 纯净原版

replies.author: CMD丶BLOCK_
replies.txt_content: 是纯净生存服

replies.author: 文豪小绝
replies.txt_content: 刚接触当然是纯净啦

replies.author: 奇怪077
replies.txt_content: zhama盒子的联机

replies.author: 寒都科技服
replies.txt_content: 原版接触的 当时朋友很多

replies.author: fcukdoing
replies.txt_content: 肝吧，肝成1方大佬去（强行暗示）
